resources.string: Allow notification lights in do not disturb mode
Pressing the volume rocker up/down will wake the device
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged.
Right edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
View or change power menu entries
Enabling this option works for both status bar and lockscreen
When screen off, long-pressing the volume rockers will seek music tracks
Volume rocker wake must be disabled
Use letters and emojis to customize your carrier label
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Press on color below to apply

\n\nWARNING: This app does not declare the ability for it to be moved to adopted storage. You may forcibly move it regardless but app data may need to be cleared in order for it to function correctly.
Moving ^1 and its data to ^2 will take only a few moments. You won\u2019t be able to use the app until the move is complete. \n\nDon\u2019t remove the ^2 during the move.^3
Show clear all button on recents panel
Search bar in recents menu is enabled
Search bar in recents menu is disabled
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Customize clock styles and date format
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Don\'t send touch events for navigation and status bar gestures to apps
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry

The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Change the shortcuts on lockscreen to whatever you want
Open custom lock screen shortcuts on longpress
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
To add a custom per-app configuration for expanded state, set "Enabled for all" to the off position
Choose a default expanded desktop style
Enable advanced settings for location in quick settings
Configure what icons are shown on status bar
Allow override of default values with user config
Pulse will be triggered by pick up sensor
Pick up sensor will not be utilized as a trigger
Pulse will be triggered by notifications
Notifications will not be utilized as a trigger
Enable various network traffic options in statusbar
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion!
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Pulse is brilliant equalizer bar style audio visualization on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio visualization on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed
Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Enable to show the music visualizer on the lock screen
Enable to use a custom color, disable to create the color from the lock screen background automatically
When Privacy Guard is enabled, the app will not be able to access personal data such as contacts, messages or call logs.
When enabling Privacy Guard for a built-in app, the app will not be able to access or provide personal data. This may cause other apps to misbehave.
Enable by default for newly-installed apps
Manage which apps have access to your personal data

In this screen you can choose which apps Privacy Guard should be active for by simply tapping on them. Selected apps will not be able to access your personal data such as contacts, messages or call logs. Long pressing an app\'s entry opens its app details screen.\n\nBuilt-in apps are not shown by default but can be revealed by selecting the respective menu option.
Superuser indicator is visible when a session is active
Toggle to show superuser indicator when a session is active
Allowing apps to request root access is very dangerous and could compromise the security of your system!
Adjust brightness by sliding across status bar
Show an editor window after taking a screenshot in order to do some operations like cropping, saving or sharing it
Always use the cropped image inside the cropping area, even if the apply button hasn\'t been pressed
You have no button assigned to the \"Home\" action! This can make your device unusable!
